help-file.title: AVENGER
help-file.content:
Avengers are the faithful servants of Gods, bringing justice to their evil enemies. They are recruited from the most dedicated paladins willing to sacrifice their lives entirely to the God's service. A Paladin becomes an Avenger through Ascension, when he sacrifices the ability to enjoy mortal pleasures and is imbued with God's might. Avengers no longer see like other mortals, thus they cannot be blinded. They are surrounded by holy light and their eyes emanate with internal glow. Rumors say they are able to paralyze their foes solely through staring at them. The Avengers can use all kinds of heavy armors but limit themselves to powerful, 2-handed swords only.
Allowable races: Human, Half-Elf. Equipment usage: Like all classes on Duris, Avengers have their own item restrictions. They can use most heavy armor and weapons but are more limited in using magical items. Innate Abilities: Inability to Blind, God Call, Magic Resistance.
